pkgmetadata.longdescription: Hazard Ratio Estimation using Cox Model Weighted by the Estimated Propensity Score // Estimates the log hazard ratio associated with a binary exposure using a Cox PH model weighted by the propensity score. Propensity model is estimated using a simple logistic regression. Variance estimation takes into account the propensity score estimation step with the method proposed by Hajage et al. (2018) doi:10.1002/bimj.201700330. Both the average treatment effect on the overall (ATE) or the treated (ATT) population can be estimated. For the ATE estimation, both unstabilized and stabilized weights can be used.
